scripts.init: npm install && cd ./extension && npm install --from-lock-file && cd ../trade-republic && npm install --from-lock-file && cd ..
scripts.build: cd trade-republic && npm run build && cd ../extension && npm run build
scripts.style: cd trade-republic && npm run style && cd ../extension && npm run style
scripts.release: rm -rf ./dist && cd trade-republic && npm run build && cd ../extension && npm run build && cd ..
